titleStmt.title: The trial of a Christians estate: or a discouerie of the causes, degrees, signes and differences of the apostasie both of the true Christians and false in a sermon preached in London by Master Paul Bayne, and afterward sent in writing by him to his friend W.F.
titleStmt.author: Baynes, Paul, d. 1617.

titleStmt.title: The trial of a Christians estate: or a discouerie of the causes, degrees, signes and differences of the apostasie both of the true Christians and false in a sermon preached in London by Master Paul Bayne, and afterward sent in writing by him to his friend W.F.
titleStmt.author: Baynes, Paul, d. 1617.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted by Felix Kyngston, for Nathanael Newbery, and are to be sold at his shop vnder S. Peters Church in Cornhill, and in Popes head Alley,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: The triall of a Christians estate.
